defs: = ಮಣಿವಿಭೂಷಣ.
a necklace made of gems.
Lakṣmi, the Goddess of Wealth.
the quality of being beautiful, lovely; beauty.
the act or profession of supervising the routine works in a temple, monastery, palace, toll-gate, etc.
an officer whose profession is that; a supervisor or superintendent.
the taluk revenue office.
revenue or tax levied or collected from the citiziens by a local revenue-officer.
= ಮಣೆಗಾರ.
= ಮಣೆಗಾರ.
a viny annual plant akin to cowpea, that has round seeds, used as a vegetable.
= ಮಣಿಸು.
the sound produced by a bell when struck by its clapper.
(pros.) a verse of four lines, each line having three groups of three syllables followed by a long syllable at the end (-u-, uu-, uu-, - totally fifteen prosodic units).
any ornament having or embedded with a gem or gems.
a shop where gems are sold.
a man who sells, deals with, gems.
(pros.) a verse of four lines, each line having five groups of thyllables each, (-u-, uuu, -uu, -uu, -u-, totally twenty one prosodic units).
the work or profession of dealing with, studding the ornaments with, gems.
a slab or a piece of stone having gem or gems in it.
a red variety of arsenic.
a kind of plant.
a kind of perfume.
= ಮಣಿಶಿಲೆ.
to subdue; to conquer; to defeat.
to force to bend.
to cause to bow in reverence.
the act of bending, bowing before another or a deity, in reverence.
any action, task, etc. required by or relating to one's occupation or position; duty.
a service offered to a deity or a king.
= ಮಣಿಯ.
= ಮಣೆಗಾರ.
the vine Momordica dioica of Cucurbitaceae family.
its bitter gourd-like fruit.
= ಮಣೆಗಾರ.
the grass Vetiveria lowsonii of Poaceae family.
the juice, edible fruit of the plant Ananas comosus of Bromeliaceae family.
= ಮಣಿಯ.
= ಮಣೆಗಾರ.
= ಮಣ್ಣು.
a smell of stale oil; a rancid smell.
any unclean, dusty, repugnant matter.
(fig.) gross moral corruption.
a rectangular or square wooden plank with legs, for sitting on.
a square board with squares of two alternating colours used to play chess on or a rectangular plank having two rows of seven hollows to play usu. with tamarind seeds.
ಮಣೆಹಾಕು maṇe hāku to place a seat before another to sit on. 2. (fig.) to give undue preference, respect, to; to be favourably biased towards.
= ಮಣಿಯ.
a carrier of messages; a messenger.
the office or profession of supervising the routine works in a temple, monastery, palace, toll-gate, etc.
= ಮಣೆಗಾರತನ.
= ಮಣೆಗಾರ.
the land tax or revenue account of a government.
= ಮಣಿಯ.
= ಮಣೆಗಾರ.
= ಮಣೆಗಾರ.
a piece of broken pottery; a potsherd.
= ಮಣ್ಣುಕೊಡು.
(fig.) to be destroyed,demolished completely.
a lump of mud.
(fig.) a worthless or useless thing.
the grass Digitaria longiflora of Poaceae family.
the small or medium-sized, deciduous tree Cordia dichotoma ( = C. myxa) of Boraginaceae family.
its plum used in making pickles.
a playing in the soil or dust.
a game so played.
either of two soft fleshy milk-secreting glandular organs on the chest of a woman; the breast; ಮಣ್ಣಿ ಉಣಿಸು maṇṇi uṇisu to feed (a baby) milk from the breast; to suckle; to breast-feed.
a man owning a farming land.
the loose, granular, soft part of land; soil; earth.
a farming region;land.
ground considered as property; estate; land.
powdery earth fine enough to be easily suspended in air; dust.
(fig.) that which is worldly and not lasting; an short-lived thing.

ಮಣ್ಣಿನ ವಾಸನೆ maṇṇina vāsane the characteristic odour of the soil, that is raised when a light rain falls on a dry area; 2. nature of being loyal to the local qualities, reflecting local problems, concerns, views, etc. in literature and art; ಮಣ್ಣು ತಿನ್ನಿಸು maṇṇu tinnisu = ಮಣ್ಣಿಗೆ ಮಣ್ಣು ತಿನ್ನಿಸು; ಮಣ್ಣು ತಿನ್ನುವ ಕೆಲಸ maṇṇu tinnuva kelasa (fig.) a despicable, shameful deed or act; ನಾಲ್ಕು ಹಿಡಿ ಮಣ್ಣು ಹಾಕು nālku hiḍi maṇṇu hāku = ಮಣ್ಣು ಮಾಡು - 1; ಮಣ್ಣಾಗು maṇṇāgu (dust, dirt) to be smirched on; 2. to be mixed with the earth or buried under the ground; 3. to be ruined or destroyed; ಮಣ್ಣಿಗೆ ಮಣ್ಣು ತಿನ್ನಿಸು maṇṇige maṇṇu tinnisu (fig.) to inflict distress on; 2. (fig.) to cause to be servile; to make to behave humbly or abjectly; ಮಣ್ಣಿಗೆ ಮಣ್ಣು ತಿನ್ನು maṇṇige maṇṇu tinnu (fig.) to be subject to distress; to be distressed; 2. (fig.) to behave humbly or abjectly; to be servile; ಮಣ್ಣಿನ ಮಕ್ಕಳು maṇṇina makkaḷu (pl.) natives of a state or region; 2. (pl.) people earning their living by farming; farmers; ಮಣ್ಣು ತಿನ್ನು maṇṇu tinnu = ಮಣ್ಣಿಗೆ ಮಣ್ಣು ತಿನ್ನು; ಮಣ್ಣು ಬೀಳು maṇṇu bīḷu (dust, soil,) to fall on or into; 2. (fig.) (loss, destruction, etc.) to happen; ಮಣ್ಣು ಮಸಿ maṇṇu masi a useless, worthless thing; ಮಣ್ಣು ಮುಕ್ಕಿಸು maṇṇu mukkisu = ಮಣ್ಣಿಗೆ ಮಣ್ಣು ತಿನ್ನಿಸು; ಮಣ್ಣು ಮುಕ್ಕು maṇṇu mukku = ಮಣ್ಣಿಗೆ ಮಣ್ಣು ತಿನ್ನು; ಮಣ್ಣು ಮಾಡು maṇṇu mādu to put (a dead body) into the earth; to bury; 2. to mar (a clothe, clean thing, etc.) with soil, muddy water, etc.; 3. to damage or injure in such a way as to make useless, valueless, etc.; to spoil; ಮಣ್ಣಿನ ಕಾಲು ನೀರಿಗೆ ಆಗದು, ಮರದ ಕಾಲು ಬೆಂಕಿಗೆ ಆಗದು maṇṇina kālu nīrigeāgau, marada kālu benkige āgadu (prov.) that which is good in one respect is not so in another respect; that which is good for the back is bad for the head; 2. each of the option or means has some defect or the other as to render it useless; ಮಣ್ಣು ಹೊರು maṇṇu horu (fig.) to toil; 2. (fig.) to go to a school (for learning).
to put loose soil on a dead body while burying.
= ಮಣ್ಣಿಗ.
to put (a dead body) in to the ground and cover with earth; to bury.
(fig.) to spoil; to destroy completely; to cause to become utterly futile.
(fig.) to be spoiled, destroyed completely; to become futile.
(fig.) to be spoiled, destroyed completely; to become futile.
= ಮಣ್ಣುಹುಳು.
(fig.) a being spoiled or destroyed completely.
end or cessation of life; death.
the form of potassium nitrate, KNO3, that occurs naturally, used in the manufacture of fireworks, fluxes, gunpowder, etc.; niter; saltpeter.
a snake that supposedly feeds on earth.
to be decomposed or spoiled being in the constant contact of soil.
= ಮಣ್ಣುಹುಳು.
any one of numerous annelid worms that burrow in soil and feed on soil nutrients and decaying organic matter; an earthworm.
= ಮಣ್ಣುಹುಳು.
= ಮಣ್ಣುಗೂಡಿಸು.
a feeling of high regard, honour or esteem; respect.
a respectable, estimable man.
a tributary ruler.
a man who leads, directs, commands or guides a group of people; a leader.
an extent of land given as a gift.
a relatively large part of a country; a district.
an archaic kind of tax.
a class of persons engaged in earth-work as digging tanks, building roads, etc.
a member of this class.
= ಮಣ್ಗಪ್ಪರ.
= ಮಣ್ಣುಹಿಡಿ.
lack of natural brightness; dullness; lack-lustre.
a death caused by an outragious or heinous act.
mental discomfiture and disquietude; anxiety.
a ruining or being ruined; the state of being irrecoverably damaged; ruination.
any violent mental disturbance.
to be killed heinously.
to become extremely upset over misfortune, danger, etc.
= ಮಣ್ಮಳಿ.
= ಮಣ್ಮಳಿಗೊಳ್.
= ಮಣ್ಮಳಿಗೊಳ್ - 2.
to have violent mental disturbance.
= ಮಣ್ಣುಮುಕ್ಕ.
a belief or judgement that rests on grounds insufficient to produce complete certainty; an opinion.
a personal view, attitude or appraisal; an opinion.
anything intended or planned; aim, end or purpose; intention.
the act or process of thinking; reflection; meditation; cogitation; thought.
any specific system of belief and worship, often involving a code of ethics and a philosophy; a religion.
theory or logical analysis of the principles underlying conduct, thought, knowledge, and the nature of the universe; philosophy.
a decision by a individual on a proposal, resolution, bill, etc. or a choice between candidates for office, expressed by written ballot, voice, show of hands, etc.; a vote.
a ticket, paper, etc., by which a vote is registered; a ballot.

ಮತ ಚಲಾಯಿಸು mata calāyisu to cast one's ballot (as in voting); to express the will or a preference in a matter by ballot, voice, etc.; ಮತ ನೀಡು mata nīḍu = ಮತ ಚಲಾಯಿಸು; ಮತ ಕೊಡು mata koḍu = ಮತ ಚಲಾಯಿಸು; ಮತ ಹಾಕು mata hāku = ಮತ ಚಲಾಯಿಸು.
an elephant.
a cloud.
name of a mythological sage.
one of the names of Pārvati, the constort of Śiva.
= ಮತಗಟ್ಟೆ.
one of the several divisions of a state, nation, town, etc. which, as a single unit, elects one person as its representative in a council, assembly or parliament; an electoral constitution.
a small temporary structure or enclosure for voting at elections; a electoral booth.
the act or process of counting of votes in an election.
disagreement or conflict caused by differences of opinion.
conflict or animosity caused between people of two religions.
= ಮತಪತ್ರ.
the act or fact of casting one's vote.
a man who has a right to vote; an elector, esp. one who actually votes; a voter.
= ಮತಕ್ಷೇತ್ರ.
a slip or sheet of paper or the like, on which a voter marks his or her vote; a ballot.
a box, usu. with its lid closed and sealed, having a slit on the top for dropping of ballots by voters; a ballot-box.
the fact of one's opinion being different from or being in non agreement with, another's or others opinion; difference of opinion.
lacking faith in or deliberately rejecting any specific system of belief, worship, religious philosophy, code of ethics, etc.
ex-communicated, expelled from one's religion.
a man who lacks faith in or deliberately rejects any specific system of belief, worship, religious philosophy, code of ethics, etc.
a man who is ex-communicated, expelled from his religion.
a woman who lacks faith in or deliberately rejects any specific system of belief, worship, religious philosophy, code of ethics, etc.
a woman who is ex-communicated, expelled from her religion.
= ಮತಲಬು.
= ಮತಲಬು.
= ಮತಲಬು.
something one intends to get or do; intention; purpose.
a tolerating or being tolerant of another's belief, worship, religious philosophy, code of ethics, etc.; religious tolerance.
(masc.) a follower of a particular religion.
the establishment of a new system of belief and worship, involving a code of ethics and a philosophy.
difference of opinion.
a changing of one's opinion and adopting another.
a converting or being converted from one religion to another; religious conversion.
being intolerant of any other system of belief and worship, ethical code or philosophy, other than one's own.
a man who is intolerant of any other system of belief and worship, ethical code or philosophy other than his own; a fundamentalist.
rude intolerance towards any other system of belief and worship, ethical codes or philosophy of religions other than one's own; religious fanaticism.
a woman who is intolerant of any other system of belief and worship, ethical code or philosophy other than his own; a fundamentalist.
the act of following religiously a specific system of belief and worship.
the right to vote (as in a general elections for a local body, state or parliament); franchise.
a follower of a particular religion.
a kind of fire works, that burns with bright light, when lit.
a kind of military fire-arm.
a ridge or swell moving along the surface of a liquid or body of water as a result of disturbance, as by wind or from within; a wave.
a follower of a particular religion.
the mind as the faculty of perception, understanding, etc.
the act of using the will; exercise of the will as in deciding what to do; volition.
notion, thought, opinion or intention, as the result of deliberation of the mind.
(rhet.) one of the minor sentiments in dramatics.
name of one of the twelve petals of the mystical lotus flower in the centre of the body.
(jain.) the act of thinking seriously and deeply about or pondering over; a meditating upon.

to deprive of understanding; to cause bewilderment; to confound.
to direct badly as to ruin; to deprive another of rational thinking or judgement.
(the ability to come to opinions about things, understanding, good sense) to be lost.
to lose understanding, good sense or the ability to come to opinions about things.
a person lacking normal ability to understand, to come to opinions about things, good sense.
the ability to come to opinions about things, understanding, good sense, etc. of a person; judgement.
a realisation that happens in the mind in understanding a fact.

loss of judgement power, intelligence or wisdom; madness.
(psych.) a severe organic mental deficiency or impairment; dementia.
lacking judgement power, intelligence or wisdom; mad.
(psych.) mentally ill or deranged; demented; insane.
a man lacking normal ability to understand, to come opinions about things, goodsense.
a man suffering from organic mental deficiency or impairment.
the state of being insane; mental illness or derangement.
a man lacking normal ability to understand, to come opinions about things, good sense.
a man suffering from organic mental deficiency or impairment.

characterised by adherence to religion or a religion; religious.
of, concerned with, appropriate to or teaching religion; religious.

a man belonging to a religion.

rude intolerance towards any other system of belief and worship, ethical codes or philosophy of religions other than one's own and unduly biased towards the merits of one's own religion; religious fanaticism.
a flat, wingless, bloodsucking hemipterous insect, Cimex lectularius, that infests houses and esp. beds and furniture; a bed-bug.
a beardless man.
a tusk-less elephant.
a male buffalo.
a cocoanut tree (Cocos nucifera of Arecaceae family).

stupefied or excited by a chemical substance (especially alcohol); intoxicated; drunk; inebriated.
sexually aroused; excited by a strong sexual desire.
lost in joy.
vehemently incensed; very angry; filled wirh wrath; wrathful.
an intoxicated, inebriated man.
a man who is vehemently incensed.
the thorny plant Datura stramonium of Solanaceae family.
(pros.) a metrical verse, having ten syllables in each of the four lines, arranged in three groups followed by a long unit (---, -uu, uu-, -).
again; once more.
in addition; as well; besides.
(fr. ಮಸ್ತಕ) the top part of the body in humans; the head.
the highest or uppermost part of anything; top; head.
to have on or around the head (as a band, etc.).
a very attractive or seductive looking woman.

(pros.) a metrical verse having in all its four lines, four groups of three syllables ( uuu, -uu, u-u, -u-).

the state of being stupefied or excited by an alcoholic substance; intoxication.
overbearing pride evidence by a superior manner towards others; haughtiness.
the state of the mind being overpowered by wrath; wrathfullness.

a man intoxicated by an alcoholic substance.
he who is haughty or having overbearing pride.
(pros.) a verse of four lines, each line having five groups of three syllables and one long syllable at the end (---, --u, u--, uu-, -, totally twenty two prosodic units).

= ಮತ್ತಲು.

a unit of land measure.

(dance.) a movement of the legs on the ground (standing erect on the feet, in normal position, one foot is moved forward and backward, keeping the heel of that foot joined with the centre of the other foot).
a fence, wall of low height, etc. enclosing a building.
an open porch or portico, usu. roofed, along the outside of a building; a verandah.
the place on the floor of a war-charriot, where the archer stands while fighting.

a horizontal superstructure supported by columns and composed of epistyle, frieze and cornice.
a pillow or cushion used to lean on.

the sidewing on either side of the stage in a theatre.

(dance.) one of the thirty two kinds of artistic combination of hand movements.

another tree Terminalia crenulata of the same family.
another tree Terminalia tomentosa ( =T. alata) of the same family.
a small, congenital spot on the human skin, usu. dark-coloured; a mole.
a property (as an extent of land, a building, etc.) that belongs, in general, to all the residents of a village; a public property.
the state of being stupefied or excited by an alcoholic substance; intoxication.
overbearing pride exhibited in a superior manner towards others; haughtiness.
(used to join elements of equal grammatical value) also; in addition; moreover; as well as; and.
an intoxicated, inebriated woman.
a woman who is vehemently incensed.
at a later time; subsequently; afterward.
once more; another time; anew; in addition; again.

one more; additional.
another one; an additional one.
once more; again.
treatment given to an intoxicated person to remove the effect of the intoxicant.
a narrow, long, lose cloth for tying round the head as a headgear.
the letter ' ಮ್ ' usu. pronounced with the vowel 'ಅ'.
= ಮತ್ಸ್ಯ - 1.
jealous resentment against a rival, a person enjoying success or advantage, etc. or against another's success or advantage itself; jealousy; envy.
the feeling of one who hates; intense dislike or extreme aversion or hostility; hatred.
strong, stern or fierce anger; deeply resentful indignation; ire; wrath.
a man having jealous resentment against his rival enjoying success or advantage, etc. or against another's success or advantage itself.

to resentfully envy; to have jealous feeling against.
to have strong, stern or fierce anger; to be enraged (against).
to struggle for superiority (with another); to compete with.
any of various cold-blooded, aquatic vertebrates, having gills, commonly fins, and typically an elongated body; a fish.
the first of the ten incarnations of Viṣṇu, in which he had taken the form of a fish.
name of one of the eighteen major Purāṇas.
the twelfth sign of the zodiac; Pisces.

the drainings of jaggery or crude sugar; treacle; molasses.
the breeding, rearing, and transplantation of fish by artificial means, as an industry.
catching of fish in a large scale for purpose of selling; fishing industry.
a place where fish, etc. are caught; fishing ground; fishery.
a place where fish are bred; fish hatchery; fishery.
(log.) the maxim of a big fish eating a small one, used in case where stronger persons exploit the weaker ones.
the poisonous plant Helleborus niger of Ranunculaceae family, with buttercup-like flowers, the rhizomes of which were used as a heart stimulant and cathartic; black hellebore.
one of the eighteen major Purāṇas.
a fish-catching implement, as a hook, net, etc.
a fish-catcher; a fisherman.

Viṣṇu, who took the form of a fish in his first of the ten incarnations.

fish-eating.
the first of the ten incarnations of Viṣṇu, in which he took the form of a fish.
Viṣṇu.
the business of catching, processing, packing or selling fish or lobsters, shrimp, etc. as an industry; fishery.
the act of beating, shaking (curd) in a churn to form butter; churning.
a tormenting or being tormented.
the killing in a brutal manner; slaughter.
he who slaughters; a slaughterer.
a rubbing of one object against another; friction.
a physical struggle; a fight.
the result of cogitation; concerted thought or reflection.
a deliberating or considering carefully.
to stir, beat or shake (curd) to form butter.
to rub (two objects) with each other.
(physical struggle, fight) to happen.
to engage in a physical struggle; to fight.
to consider and argue the pros and cons of (to arrive at a conclusion); to disucss.
a stick with a disc-like part, with zig-zag teeth, at one end for churning curd; a churning stick.
a man who churns (curd) to form butter.
stirred; churned.
destroyed; demolished; ruined.
deliberated; thought over.
churned curd to which water is not added.
a decision taken after a careful deliberation.

to stir, beat or shake (curd) to form butter.
to rub (two objects) with each other.
to consider and argue the pros and cons of (to arrive at a conclusion); to discuss.
to think deeply and carefully.
to inflict pain, distress; to torment.
the state in which the nervous system is affected by an intoxicant, as alcohol; intoxication.
excitement beyond self-control; a feeling of wild excitement; frenzy.
a strong sexual desire.
the state of being carried away with joy, love, etc.; ecstasy.
the feeling, attitude or expression of disdaining; overbearing, haughty behaviour.
the state of being young, characterised by immature, impetuous, lively and vigorous qualities.
something that intoxicates as an alcoholic liquor; an intoxicant.
a sweet, viscid fluid produced by bees from the nectar collected from flowers, and stored in nests or hives as food; honey.
a liquid exuded from the temples of a sexually excited elephant.
a honey-bee.
cotton got from the plants Gossypium arboreum and other akin plants.
a wave formed on the surface of a water body, caused by friction of wind or internal disturbance.
the viscid, whitish fluid secreted by the male reproductive organs, containing spermatozoa; the semen.
a substance with a strong, penetrating odour, obtained from a small sac (musk bag) under the skin of the abdomen in the male musk-deer; musk.
the quality of being beautiful, attractive; beauty.
the tree Avicennia officinalis ( = A. tomentosa) of Verbenaceae family.
(rhet.) the state of being carried away by joy, as one of the minor sentiments.
(math.) a symbol for the number eight.
making an indistinct, but sweet sound (while being intoxicated with love).
an elephant in rut.

a chronic, mildly infectious disease caused by the bacterium Mycobacterium leprae, affecting the peripheral nervous system, skin, and nasal mucosa and variously characterised by ulcerations, tubercular nodules, and loss of sensation; leprosy.

a lake or water-tank.
a kind of plant.

the big-sized, evergreen treen Chukrassia tabularis of Meliaceae family.
(a reservoir, water-tank, etc.) to let excess water flow out.
